zh.title: 美国国会通过《能源税法》
超级马里奥兄弟在北美发售
捷克斯洛伐克发生天鹅绒革命
南非议会通过临时宪法
卢克索袭击事件造成大量伤亡
阿诺·施瓦辛格就任加州州长
越南正式加入世界贸易组织
卡塔尔埃米尔将王位传给儿子

en.title: Bangladesh coup attempt failed; Khaled Mosharraf killed.
Super Mario Bros. released in North America.
NAFTA approved by the U.S. House of Representatives.
Luxembourg becomes the first EU country to implement the euro.
Arnold Schwarzenegger sworn in as Governor of California.
PlayStation 3 was released in North America.
Tatarstan Boeing 737 crash kills 50 in Kazan, Russia.
The International Association of Athletics Federations suspended Russia.
First confirmed case of COVID-19 traced back to this date in China.
